articles.author: Adam Vjestica
articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 preorders go live at one European retailer, with a cheaper than expected price - The Shortcut
articles.description: An Italian retailer is taking Nintendo Switch 2 preorders, despite no release date or price being announced
articles.content:
• Nintendo Switch 2 preorders are live at one European retailer
  • The console is on sale for 364.99 (around $379.77)
  • Nintendo hasnt announced the consoles price or release … [+1979 chars]
